details: Developed and maintained web applications using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack.
Implemented features such as lazy loading, user authentication, and state management using Redux.
Utilized Azure Blob Storage for storing participant profile images and news posters in the 'Planet Quizzer' project.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Promoted to lead a team of developers.
Responsible for project planning, task allocation, and ensuring timely delivery.
Mentor junior developers, conduct code reviews, and drive process improvements.
Foster a collaborative and productive work environment.
